message.content:
cs.LG, cs.MA, cs.DM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper discusses decision-tree learning algorithms for targeted advertising, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). It also involves partitioning potential customers into groups, which could be considered a form of multi-agent systems (cs.MA). Additionally, the paper involves a cost-benefit analysis, which could be categorized under discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The use of probability modeling for purchase behavior could also fall under artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the comparison of different strategies, which could be considered a form of cryptography and security (cs.CR).
